chunks.zh: 新的一年，买了一台旧能源杂牌车
chunks.en: In the new year, bought an old energy miscellaneous brand car

chunks.zh:
![]( https://p.ipic.vip/tegthp.jpg)

顺便问一下，没有有人想购入一台 18 年上牌 雨燕 的手动 1.5
chunks.en:
![]( https://p.ipic.vip/tegthp.jpg)

By the way, is there anyone who wants to buy a manual 1.5 Swift, registered in 2018?

chunks.zh: 今天打算把开了 10 年的高尔夫出掉，置换小米 yu7
chunks.en: Today I plan to sell my 10-year-old Golf and replace it with a Xiaomi yu7

chunks.zh: hahaha, 原来 V 站竟然也有喜欢驾驶的人哪.我的也是同款杂牌车, 不过我还没有开过手动雨燕. 雨燕也是好车啊.
chunks.en: hahaha, V station actually has people who like driving. Mine is the same miscellaneous brand car, but I haven't driven a manual Swift yet. Swift is also a good car.

chunks.zh: @rossroma 都是好车，小米的车现在映像中出品定价都很好
chunks.en: @rossroma They are all good cars. In my impression, Xiaomi cars have good product pricing now

chunks.zh: 哈哈哈，扫把佬。。。
chunks.en: Hahaha, Subaru fan...

chunks.zh: @iintothewind 270 块钱加满，高速跑 600 公里
chunks.en: @iintothewind Filled up for 270 yuan, runs 600 kilometers on the highway

chunks.zh: @DoubleKing #5 对啊, 你换 BRZ 一箱油就只能跑 300 多公里了, 而且它还要吃细粮.
chunks.en: @DoubleKing #5 Yes, if you switch to a BRZ, you can only run more than 300 kilometers on a tank of gas, and it also needs to eat fine grains.

chunks.zh: 这个车很喜欢，但是让我买却不一定买了
chunks.en: I really like this car, but I might not buy it

chunks.zh: @CCHome
chunks.en: @CCHome

chunks.zh: @iintothewind #6  周三周日 中石化，逢 8 壳牌
chunks.en: @iintothewind #6 Sinopec on Wednesdays and Sundays, Shell every 8th

chunks.zh: 心心念念 mx-5 ，可惜要向现实低头
chunks.en: I've been dreaming of an mx-5, but unfortunately, I have to bow to reality

chunks.zh: @xiangbohua 再年轻一次，花有重开日，人无再少年
chunks.en: @xiangbohua Be young again, flowers can bloom again, but people don't have a second youth

chunks.zh: @darkengine 可以买一台 mx5 再买便宜的家用
chunks.en: @darkengine You can buy an mx5 and then a cheap family car

chunks.zh: 恭喜 op ，流下羡慕的泪水。如果我没家庭也选 brz 爽爽了，人无再少年啊。顺便问下手动雨燕多少钱？
chunks.en: Congratulations op, shedding envious tears. If I didn't have a family, I would have chosen a BRZ to enjoy it, but people don't have a second youth. By the way, how much is the manual Swift?

chunks.zh: 如果家里开加油站，还是喜欢开油车的， 不然每次加油都少买一个游戏
chunks.en: If I owned a gas station, I would still prefer to drive a gasoline car, otherwise I would buy one less game every time I fill up

chunks.zh: @iintothewind #2 我雨燕大多数也是加的 95 98 ，发动机工况更好
chunks.en: @iintothewind #2 I also mostly fill my Swift with 95 or 98, and the engine runs better

chunks.zh: @chengchuan1009 不到 3 ，
chunks.en: @chengchuan1009 Less than 3

chunks.zh: @kidult 可能是执念吧，电车好像给不了我机械感
chunks.en: @kidult Maybe it's an obsession, electric cars don't seem to give me a mechanical feel

chunks.zh: @chengchuan1009 原车主有轻微追尾所以价格比市场价低一点
chunks.en: @chengchuan1009 The original owner had a minor rear-end collision, so the price is a little lower than the market price

chunks.zh: @chengchuan1009 #13 其实我家人都满支持我的, 而且我们现在也只有一辆车了. 有时候出去玩或者搬运大的东西就很不方便, 但好在这样的情况不多. 遗憾的是这边的玩车费用比国内高太多了, 改装费, 赛道日费用都高, 所以没办法像在上海时那样玩车了.
chunks.en: @chengchuan1009 #13 Actually, my family fully supports me, and we only have one car now. Sometimes it's inconvenient to go out and play or move large items, but fortunately, this situation doesn't happen often. Unfortunately, the cost of playing with cars here is much higher than in China. The modification fees and track day fees are all high, so I can't play with cars like I did in Shanghai.

chunks.zh: 楼主，你这是 HDR 图片？查看本帖的时候我手机突然亮了😅。另，你这图片连定位信息都没去掉。
chunks.en: 楼主，you are the HDR photo? When I was viewing this post, my phone suddenly lit up 😅. Also, you have not removed the location information from this photo.
